plugsy.utils.Logger module¶

Logger Class. Provides global logger access and handles initiation

class plugsy.utils.Logger.Filter(filters)[source]¶

Bases: logging.Filter

Custom filter for filtering to only specific sources, such as core plugins, addon plugins, or a simple specific plugin

Constructor override

Parameters:filters – A list of filter names
filter(record)[source]¶

Custom filter method

Parameters:record – Debug record object
Returns:True if event is going to be logged. Otherwise False. Defaults to True if no filters found

Provides a Logger object

Constructor

Parameters:

  • level – Logging level,
  • log_path – Log file path
DEFAULT_LEVEL = 30¶
FILTERS_FILENAME = 'debugfilters.conf'¶
LOG_FORMAT = '%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(funcName)s(): %(message)s'¶

plugsy.utils.toposort module¶

PlugSy Utils - Topological sort for sorting plugin dependencies

plugsy.utils.toposort.toposort(data)[source]¶

Topological sorting function

Parameters:data – Dictionary of <string>:<set> where string is a an item name of forms, and <set> is a list of the item’s dependencies
Returns:Items are yielded in topologically sorted order
